mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.price,ec.lesson_num,ecd.description courseDescription,et.name,es.title oneSubject,es2.title twoSubject from edu_course as ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description as ecd on ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject as es on ec.subject_parent_id = es.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject as es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}

SELECT count(*) total, ec.id,ec.title,et.name teacherName,ec.price,ec.lesson_num,ec.cover,ec.buy_count buyCount,es.title oneSubject,es2.title twoSubject from edu_course as ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject as es on ec.subject_parent_id = es.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject as es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id
and ec.title like concat('%',#{title},'%'), and ec.teacher_id = #{teacherId,} and ec.subject_parent_id = #{subjectParentId}, and ec.subject_id = #{subjectId}, and ec.status = #{status}, and ec.status = #{status},
order by ec.buy_count DESC
order by ec.price DESC
order by ec.gmt_create DESC
